description: Describes details of a resource scan.

parameters.name: ResourceScanId
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource scan.

nested_items.name: ResourceScanId
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource scan. The format is arn:${Partition}:cloudformation:${Region}:${Account}:resourceScan/${Id}. An example is ``arn:aws:cloudformation:us-east-1:123456789012:resourceScan/f5b490f7-7ed4-428a-aa06-31ff25db0772 ``.

nested_items.name: StatusReason
nested_items.description: The reason for the resource scan status, providing more information if a failure happened.

nested_items.name: StartTime
nested_items.description: The time that the resource scan was started.

nested_items.name: EndTime
nested_items.description: The time that the resource scan was finished.

nested_items.name: PercentageCompleted
nested_items.description: The percentage of the resource scan that has been completed.

nested_items.name: ResourceTypes
nested_items.description: The list of resource types for the specified scan. Resource types are only available for scans with a Status set to COMPLETE or ``FAILED ``.

nested_items.name: ResourcesScanned
nested_items.description: The number of resources that were listed. This is only available for scans with a Status set to COMPLETE, EXPIRED, or ``FAILED ``.

nested_items.name: ResourcesRead
nested_items.description: The number of resources that were read. This is only available for scans with a Status set to COMPLETE, EXPIRED, or FAILED.

nested_items.name: ScanFilters
nested_items.description: The scan filters that were used.

nested_items.name: Types
nested_items.description: An array of strings where each string represents an Amazon Web Services resource type you want to scan. Each string defines the resource type using the format AWS::ServiceName::ResourceType, for example, AWS::DynamoDB::Table. For the full list of supported resource types, see the Resource type support table in the CloudFormation User Guide.
